channel.title: Sentoria-Ps [317] - Economy - Custom bosses - Custom phats - Brand New Server
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/fp7a69.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Sentoria-Ps
We are a new Economy Based 317 server[/COLOR] [/SIZE] [url=http://sentoria.enjin.com/forum][size=18pt]CLICK HERE TO PLAY[/size][/url] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Features: -Duo Slayer -Target system -Dwarf Multi-cannon -Bank Tabs -Switchable gameframes -Client settings -Money Pouch -Revenant cave -Killsteam system -Player user titles -Curses/quick prayers -Full summoning with working specials -All skills trainable with their own skilling zone -Stable economy -Pking is fun, and worth value -Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles -Great shops to full fill the needs of players -Working clue scrolls -Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking -Great pvm community -Unique barrows with interface -Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports -63 wave jad, log out between waves supported -Custom mini bosses coming soon -Custom Drop Zone Added -Custom Boss for donor -Custom Partyhats added - Tickets (1b-2b-100m) -Donor ticket Tradeable[/COLOR]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4769704/FpVi4Vi.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4769708/XATHLAf.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4769721/BdeUnd3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4769735/TxLZrwL.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4769736/GCF9gp9.png[/img]

item.title: Sentoria-Ps [317] - Economy - Custom bosses - Custom phats - Brand New Server
item.dc:creator: @Nerdypker123 Nerdypker123
item.description:
@Nerdypker123 wrote:

The advert looks alright, yet the server looks really bland, not much to it. Also, the website could use a lot of reworking. The forums are really sloppy, but it’s cool you’re trying to make a server and you have a little ambition.

Read full topic
item.source: Sentoria-Ps [317] - Economy - Custom bosses - Custom phats - Brand New Server
